message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is considerably higher for me. How about we settle at $13,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit out of my budget. How about we meet at $9,500?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Let's make this work â€“ how about $11,500?
I'm getting closer to my budget, but $11,500 is still a bit too high. Can we try $9,000?
